author: Jean-pierre Declemy
content: I apologise for offending you but the question remains, why is a race celebrating a Portuguese explorer leading a Spanish expedition starting from a British port?

author: D, Peter Boucher, Kt. SMOM, International Master Mariner
content:
This is the type of shoddy unfunny comment which does nothing to ease the pain of old hurts. It raises memories of a very difficult time from another generation, under a quite different political situation, during my days as Master of a British ship.

Good Watch
